title: Why is the updated client so slow?
body: It seems like after I play 1 game in the new beta client it starts to be chuggy and takes ages loading the end of game stats. Whenever i send messages to my friends they take ages. In game they are fine but in the client they take a god minute before they are sent. My ping is good in game so it can't be that.
